document.full_text: a judge on thursday gave the nigerian man charged with attempting to blow up a passenger airliner on christmas day 2009 until mid-august to negotiate a plea agreement, otherwise the case will go to trial.
document.title: accused underwear bomber has until august for plea
lines_and_colors: a judge on thursday gave the nigerian man charged with attempting to blow up a passenger airliner on christmas day 2009 until mid-august to negotiate a plea agreement, otherwise the case will go to trial.
